text: @MurielBowser RT if u’ll wear a mask when out even if ur outside. Which is something that should b required by all, Mayor. Do u want DC 2 b the next “city” with COVID-19 cases on the rise? I sure don’t & I’m one of those that r compromised & I’m pretty much guaranteed 2 die if I get it. STEPUP
